query.statement:
SELECT A.ZZJUNGO ,0 AS CHECK ,A.PSPID ,A.POSID ,B.ZZHOGIT, B.POST1 ,(SELECT ZSPEC1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 C WHERE C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.POSID = A.PSPID AND C.POSID_1 = A.POSID) ZSPEC1 ,(SELECT ZSPEC2 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 C WHERE C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.POSID = A.PSPID AND C.POSID_1 = A.POSID) ZSPEC2 ,(SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE C WHERE C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND C.LANG = #G_LANG# AND C.CODE2 = B.ZZACTSS) ZZACTSS_NAME ,B.ZZACTSS ,B.ZZCOMP2 ,B.APPLD ,B.APPLS ,A.TXT01 ,A.CODE2 ,A.DATE1 ,A.DATE3 ,A.NUMBE ,A.DATE2 ,A.TXT02 ,'2' MODE1 ,A.DATE3 ZZJUNGD ,(SELECT DISTINCT C.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 C WHERE C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.LIFNR = A.LIFNR) LIFNR FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0024 A ,SAPHEE.ZPST0023 B WHERE B.PSPID = A.PSPID AND B.POSID = A.POSID AND B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DATE3 != '00000000' AND A.DATE1 = B.DATE1
AND B.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND A.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND CODE2 = #CODE2#
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.DATE1 BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
